item.title: FZF (Fuzzy Finder)
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Edwin Muraya)
item.description: Installations. Two step install. We can use git to install fzf: git clone –depth 1 https://github.com/junegunn/fzf.git ~/.fzf ~/.fzf/install The above command will install fzf under ~/.fzf/bin. If you want to enable fzf inside Neovim, add the following setting to Neovim configuration (suppose your plugins manager is vim-plug ).
